Title: Like Bombing Fish In A Barrel
Description:
Turns out these rays are not as easy to catch as I thought! You seem like a pretty smart $Gguy:gal;, think you can help me out?

I made the bombs but have been having trouble using the raft with my hurt leg. The rays are common in the shallows just west of here. Take the bombs and use my raft to bring me back their stingers!

Oh yeah, watch out for the hammerheads!
ObjectivesText: Use the Goblin Fishing Bombs to kill 3 Sting Rays and bring back their stingers to Fiznix.  The Rays can be found in the shallows west of Anglers Wharf.
